74945.「黒曜のひとみは 私が\n テグラムさまに お渡ししますので……。:
I will give the Obsidian Eye pupil to Mr.
Tegram myself.

74946.「テグラムさま。\n 黒曜のひとみが 無事 手に入りましたので\n お届けに ま:
Dear Tegram. Obsidian Eye's pupil has arrived
safely, and I have come to deliver it to you.

74948.「最後の素材だ。\n これで すべての準備は ととのったぞ。: The last ingredient. Now everything is ready.

74949.「あの……。失礼ながら テグラムさま。\n これから 何をなさるおつもりなのです:
Um... with all due respect, Mr. Tegram. What
are you going to do now?

74951.「オレが グランゼドーラ王国を\n 正しい未来へ 導いてやるのさ……。:
I will lead Gran Zedora Kingdom into the right
future...

74952.「思いだすんだ。オレたちの未来が\n 誰と共に あったのか。\n オレたちが 誰:
Remember. Who our future was with. Who we were
made for.

74953.「そうだ！ オレたちのすべては\n 魔勇者アンルシアさまのために あるんだ！！:
That's right! Everything we do is for Hero
Anlucia!

74954.「な……何を おっしゃっているのです？\n 勇者姫さまは もういない。\n 私た:
What are you saying? Hero princess is gone.
Isn't it you who should be leading us?

74955.「オレたちは 魔勇者アンルシアさまに\n すべてを捧げなくちゃ ダメなんだ。\n:
We have to give everything we have to Hero
Anlucia. Your body! Your soul! Your very
existence!

74956.「オレたちのすべてを捧げて 今ここに\n 魔勇者アンルシアさまを 復活させよう！:
Let's give our all and revive Hero Anlucia
right here and now!

74957.「そんなことが できるはずが……。: I don't see how that's possible.

74958.「かつて 魔道士キルギルが作った\n この装置を使えば できる！:
With this device that Wizard Kyrgyl once made,
we can!

74959.「な……なんだ これは？\n チカラが 抜けていく……。\n テグラムさま まさ:
What is this? Tegram, are you sure you don't
want to...?

74960.「ああ もちろん 本気だ。\n この装置には 王国に暮らす者たちの\n 身体に宿:
Yes, of course I'm serious. This device has the power to draw out the magic that resides in the bodies of those who live in the
kingdom.

74961.「お前たちに集めさせた 数々の品が\n この装置のチカラを増幅し\n 王国全体に:
The items you have collected will amplify the
device's power and spread its effects
throughout the kingdom.

74962.「王国のすべての者たちから 魔力を引きだし\n 捧げたとき 魔勇者アンルシアさま:
When I have extracted the magic power from all the people of the kingdom and offered it to you... Hero, Anlucia will be resurrected! I
will resurrect her!

74963.「うう……<cs_pchero>さま。\n テグラムさまを 止めてください！\n:
Ugh...<cs_pchero>. Please stop Tegram-sama!
If this continues, everyone in the kingdom
will...

74964.<pipipi_high>「……<cs_pchero>。その名 久しいぞ。\n:
<pipipi_high>...<cs_pchero>. That name has
been a long time. Once again you are trying to
disturb me.

74965.「その声は……まさか アンルシア姫さま！？\n いったい 何が……。:
That voice... can't be Princess Anlucia!
What's going on?

74966.「ふふふ……。この男は ただの人形よ。\n かつて 剣のウデを狙って 捕らえたと:
Hmmm... this man is just a puppet. I planted a
piece of my soul in him when I once captured
him for his sword.

74967.「私の身体が滅びたとき この男は\n 私の復活を目指して 動きだすよう\n あら:
When my body perishes, this man has been
prearranged to move toward my resurrection.

74969.「この男の魂は もはや\n 欠片しか 残っていない……。\n それも すべて 飲:
There are only fragments of this man's soul
left and I will swallow them all!

74970.「ふふふ……。さすが 剣士テグラム。\n これほどのチカラとは 想像以上だ。:
Hmmm... as expected of Tegram the Swordsman.
Such power is more than I could have imagined.

74971.「……<cs_pchero>。\n 今度こそ 私の邪魔はさせんぞ！:
...<cs_pchero>. This time you will not stand
in my way!

74972.「ふん……。最初のいけにえが\n 従者ふぜいとは つまらんな……。:
Boring... that the first sacrifice is a
squire...

74973.「ふふっ。来たか……。\n お前なら 必ず来ると思っていたよ。: Hmmm... you came. I knew you would come.

74974.「だが 私の邪魔はさせん。\n 今ここで 朽ち果てるがいい！:
But you will not stand in my way. You may rot
here and now!

74975.「くっ……。またしても 私は\n お前に 敗れるというのか……。: Once again, I am defeated by you...

74976.「……なぜだ。なぜ 私は\n お前ごときに 勝てぬのだ……。: Why? Why can't I beat you?

74977.「うう……。この男を支配し\n 王国の者たちを いけにえとして\n 私は よみが:
Ugh... I should have ruled over this man,
sacrificed the men of The Kingdom Revived...

74979.「……誰かの支配なんか いらない。\n オレたちは……自分たちのチカラで\n 未:
We don't need someone else's control. We can
face the future on our own.

74980.「……バカな。作り物のお前たちが\n 自ら 未来を望むなど ありえん……。:
You're a fool. It's not possible that you, a
figment, want a future for yourselves...

74981.「じいさんが 過ちに気づいたように\n オレたちも 過ちに気づかなきゃダメなんだ:
Just as your grandfather realized his
mistakes, we need to realize ours!

74983.「……過ち……だと？ そうか……。\n 勇者ではない私が 勇者を……目指した。\:
...Mistake...? I see... I, who am not a
Hero... set my sights on becoming one. Was
that also a mistake...?

74984.「……なんてことだ。\n まさか オレの身体に 魔勇者の魂が\n 宿っていたとは:
What a surprise. I never thought that Hero's
soul resided in my body...

74985.「でも その魂も今 滅びた……。: But now that soul has perished.

74987.「テグラムさま！\n もとのテグラムさまに 戻られたのですね！: Tegram! You have returned to your old Tegram!

74988.「キッパー すまない。\n 王国の民に 言わなきゃならないことがある。\n オレ:
Kipper, I'm sorry. I have to tell the people
of the kingdom something. I'm heading back to
the castle town!

74991.「オレだ。テグラムだ！！\n 王国の人たちよ。オレの話を聞いてくれ！:
It's me. Tegram! People of the kingdom. Listen
to me!

74993.「オレは 謝らなきゃならない。\n みんなに まちがった希望を与えてしまった！:
I owe you an apology. I gave you all false
hope!

74994.「まちがった希望じゃと？\n そりゃ どういうことなんじゃ。: Wrong hope? What does that mean?

74995.「オレは この王国を導くと みんなに約束した。\n でも それは オレの意思じゃ:
I promised everyone that I would lead this
kingdom. But it wasn't my intention! I was
being controlled by the soul of Hero.

74996.「オレたちは 何者かに 作りだされた。\n でも だからと言って 誰かの支配を受:
We were created by something. But that doesn't
mean we have to leave our destiny in someone
else's hands!

74997.「オレは 幸いにも 魔勇者の支配から逃れ\n それに 気づくことができた。\n:
Fortunately, I was able to escape Hero's
control and realize it. I want you to notice
it, too!

75005.「<pc>。君が いなかったら\n オレは今ごろ この国の人すべてをいけにえに\:
<pc>. If it weren't for you, I would
have sacrificed everyone in this country by
now and brought Hero back to life.

75006.「オレは 君に 何も礼ができない。\n だから 代わりに 今後 死ぬまで\n 君:
I can never thank you for anything. So
instead, I swear that from now until my death,
I will never forget what you did for me.

75010.「あなたが そう決めたのなら\n 私は 引き止めません。\n どうか お気をつけ:
I won't hold you back if that's what you
decide. Please, take care, Tegram...

75011.「<pc>さま。\n 遅くなりましたが テグラムさまを\n 救っていただき あり:
<pc>. Thank you for saving Lady
Tegram, even though it is late.

75012.「こちらは 今回の お礼になります。\n どうぞ お納めください。:
This is our appreciation. Please pay it in
full.

75013.「<pc>さまと テグラムさまのおかげで\n この国の者たちは 自らの意思で\n:
Thanks to <pc> and Tegram, the people
of this country will be able to start walking
towards the future on their own initiative.

78854.「オレたちは 自由なんだ！\n 誰の支配も受けず 誰に頼ることもなく\n 自分た:
We are free! We should live of our own free
will, without any control or dependence on
anyone!

78855.「誰にも頼らず 私の意思で生きる……。: I live by my will, not by anyone else's...

78856.「そうだよ！ 作られたオレたちが\n 自分たちの意思と選択で 未来を作るんだ！！:
That's right! We were created to make our own
choices and create our own future! That's why
we're alive!

78857.「よくわかんないけど ボクは\n 今のこの国は キライだよ。\n もっと 楽しい:
I don't know about you, but I hate this
country. I want to make this country more fun.

78858.「そうだよ……。\n 子どもたちのためにも いい未来を\n 作ってあげなきゃ い:
Yes... we have to create a good future for our
children.

78860.「おお テグラムさま……。\n あなたの声が 皆に 勇気を与えました。: Oh Tegram your voice has inspired us all.

78861.「それじゃ これで お別れだ……。: Well, I guess this is goodbye...

78863.「この王国には もう オレなんて必要ない。\n オレも 自分の意思で 旅に出ると:
This kingdom doesn't need me anymore. I've
decided to go on my own journey. Take care,
Kipper.

102707.「ならば 見せてもらおう…………。\n 過ちを乗り越えた先の……\n グランゼド:
Then let me show you the glorious future of
Gran Zedora after we have overcome our
mistakes!

112600.テグラムの言葉は 勇者姫が消え\n生きる目的を見失っていた 王国の人々に\n大き:
Tegram's words gave hope to the people of the
kingdom, who had lost sight of their purpose
in life after the hero princess disappeared.

112601.誰かに頼ることなく 自分たちのチカラで\n未来へ向かって 生きていくことを誓いあ:
They vowed to live toward the future on their
own, without depending on anyone else, and
returned to their respective lives.
